name: Alter Ego (itch) (Ascpixi)
description:
Alter Ego is a game about making clones of yourself, and using them in interesting ways to deceive your enemies and solve puzzles!

The game auto-saves, so don't worry about your progress being lost!

🎮 Controls:

  • W, S, A, D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Create clone
  • Ctrl - Focus camera on clone
  • R (Hold for 0.5s) - Restart
  • F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
  • Escape - Quit

A big thank you to Brajker and CraftDasheq for helping me with making some of the levels and playtesting! <3

And another big thank you to you, for checking out this game! 💙
